price: (এইবোৰ হৈছে) আল্লাহৰ দান আৰু অনুগ্ৰহ; আৰু আল্লাহ সৰ্বজ্ঞ, প্ৰজ্ঞাময়।
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
